name: FLOWFALL
description:
FLOWFALL is a challenging depth perception-based arcade game where you must fit the correct shapes into the correct gates as you fall. On a whim you can swap between 4 different shapes that each have a specific gate. Touch anything and the game is over, how long can you last? Set a high score using the in game timer!

Experience an amazing 15 song synthwave soundtrack!

A unique concept for the puzzle arcade genre, fall through 8 different stages and prove you can FLOW!
